fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Mark a player for nothing at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A player who is Marked will be dealt a None Attack the next night.
- A Marked player will not be told they are Marked.
- A Mark can be cleared by Purifications or Cleanses.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the adventurers.
